service.title: Resource Digests for HTTP
service.documentation: This document defines the Digest and Want-Digest header fields for HTTP, thus allowing client and server to negotiate an integrity checksum of the exchanged resource representation data.

http-header.documentation: The "Digest" field contains a list of one or more representation digest values. It can be used in both requests and responses.
The "Want-Digest" field indicates the sender's desire to receive a representation digest on messages associated with the request URI and representation metadata.
